column1: For always telling me that I am fine the way I am and always remind me to love myself that way
I really liked how you supported me when I couldn't do something really simple
Thanks for encouraging me, it means a lot
Honey you mean a lot to me.
You look like a princess.
I liked what you said about my hair today.
Your performance was phenomenal babe, I'm so proud of yoU!
Telling me I am good enough, I don't always have to be on the top
I really wanna say that I am so happy that you have my back, even when Im cranky or upset, youre always there for me.
The outfit you wore to dinner last night was very cute.
I love how you pull off any and all plaid shirts.
For always letting me know how he feels, reminded me of how lucky I am to be loved that much
I really appreciate how you try and convince me how im going to be fine even though I know I'm not
thanks for recognizing what i have been doing
Your so cute babe.
Really love the way you smile.
That good morning text made my day
I wanted you to know that you are the most precious human being to me
Always tell me I am fine the way I am when everyone is mocking my weight
You make me so proud of what I do, you tell me to be happy no matter what, thank you.
You are a warm and caring person.
Dropping by with a bubble tea
I really appreciate how you get me water
Thanks for packing me lunch!
Thanks for the massage honey.
Thanks for helping me with packing my stuff.
Thanks for the coffee this morning, I really needed it
Thank you for always being there with me through my ups and downs
Bringing me food I crave, without forgetting any single thing
Thank you for making breakfast, I didn't even ask.
Thanks for taking care of me while I had food poisoning.
Ill pick him up from class.
Opening the window when I'm too lazy to get up
I really appreciate how you always make sure I have enough water and how you out everything in my pockets for me.
Thank you for cleaning up!
Thanks for prepping dinner boo.
Thanks for showing your care by cooking the meals for me during the times I was hungry.
Thanks for doing the dishes, I did NOT wanna do them
I truly appreciate your help for picking up the kids today boo, I was really busy on work today
Sacrificing herself to be in a hot room while I was sick and cannot turn on the air conditioner
Thank you for doing my laundry.
Thanks for getting dinner ready before I got home.
Giving me plushie and I have never had plushie my whole life
I love love love baby yoda, the good one
I really liked what you got me for my birthday, I am using it right now!
I love it when you buy me jewelry honey.
Thank you for the chocolates that you got for me. They were sweet like your love.
Oooh, you spoil me too much!
I can't believe you actually got me the wallet I have been wanting for Valentine's day. Thank you so much honey!
Always giving me gifts make sure I take care of my skins
You gave me paint brushes when I wanted to get creative, thats so amazing.
Thanks for getting me a new hairband.
He'll pick me up coffee for us or I will.
Always buying me food and bubble tea
I really like the melon milk you got me
Thank you for the gift!
Thanks for the cat necklace babe.
Thanks for remembering that I need a better communication device.
Oh my god thank you for the chocolate I love you
I love the new pair of shoe you got me for my birthday! It looks really good on me
Always buying me food
You gave me a vinyal of my favorite band, thats so sweet.
I really liked the new camera backpack that you got me.
Spending time with me even though it's -12 outside with an ice storm
Thank you for tolerating my annoying ass for two straight days
I really enjoyed our time together when we were on the trip
I love spending time with you.
I really enjoyed our time together.
Spending the day with you today was great
I had a really good time skiing with you yesterday, It is easily one of my favorite moments with you babe
Going out to restaurants, trying new food
I love it when we cuddle, on weekends esspesually.
I really enjoyed hanging out with you in the park, just the two of us.
We will spend time between classes even if only a couple minutes.
For taking coffee break and talk to me in the middle of your day
Thank you for always picking up my calls
I like the quality time we spent together, can we do it more often? Lets see each other more often.
It was amazing to be with you and listen to your thoughts.
Lunch was nice, let's do it again sometime
I hope we can travel around Asia again soon, I love experiencing new activities together with you!
Going shopping with me even though I'm very terrible to shop with
I enjoy watching our favorite shows together, forgetting everything else in our lives.
I enjoy going on long walks with you after dinner.
Hug me as if things are going to be okay
I love how you hugged me for extended periods of time
I like it when you rub my back and my head
You feel so good babe.
I really enjoyed your sensational touch.
I love it when we cuddle, you're so comfy
I love it when you hold me while playing with my hair
Always hold my hands
I love it when you play with my hair.
I like it when you hug me before I leave for work.
I never need to hear him say I love you cause I know from a hug or a hand squeeze.
Kiss me good bye
I love how you suddenly give me a good bye kiss
I like how we cuddle, let's do it more often
I love your hugs honey.
The way you touched different parts of my body made me feel loved.
It feels nice holding your hand in mine when we walk around
I will see you in 2 days, I can't wait to cuddle and kiss you again!
Always hugs me as if you don't want me to go
i love how you hold me, when you get scared at night, makes me feel important.
I like cuddling with you in bed.
